summary: Contoso Wireless offers three postpaid plans: Basic, Plus, and Premium. All three plans include unlimited talk, text, and data, international calling options, discounts for multiple lines, and a loyalty program that rewards customers with points for every dollar they spend on their Contoso Wireless account. Customers should check the coverage in their area before signing up for any of these plans, and can sign up online or by calling 1-800-Contoso.
